Package ohos.agp.utils

Class Matrix44

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.utils.Matrix44

  • public class Matrix44
extends Object
    Represents a 4x4 matrix.

    This class holds an array of 16 floating-point numbers to describe the 4x4 matrix.

    Since:
    4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Matrix44​()
      Default constructor used to create a Matrix44 instance.
      Matrix44​(Matrix44 srcMatrix)
      A constructor used to create a Matrix44 instance by using an existing matrix.
      Matrix44​(Matrix44 matrixA, Matrix44 matrixB)
      A constructor used to create a Matrix44 instance by using two specified matrices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix44

        public Matrix44​()
        Default constructor used to create a Matrix44 instance.
        Since:
        4

      • Matrix44

        public Matrix44​(Matrix44 srcMatrix)
        A constructor used to create a Matrix44 instance by using an existing matrix.

        Specifically, the values of the existing matrix are copied to the created Matrix44 instance.

        Parameters:
        srcMatrix - Indicates the existing matrix.
        Since:
        4

      • Matrix44

        public Matrix44​(Matrix44 matrixA,
                Matrix44 matrixB)
        A constructor used to create a Matrix44 instance by using two specified matrices.

        Specifically, the two specified matrices are multiplied, and the values of the product are copied to the created Matrix44 instance.

        Parameters:
        matrixA - Indicates one specified matrix for multiplication.
        matrixB - Indicates the other specified matrix for multiplication.
        Since:
        4

        Parameters:

      • setRotateDegreesAbout

        public void setRotateDegreesAbout​(float x,
                                  float y,
                                  float z,
                                  float degrees)
        Rotates about the vector [x, y, z] by a specified angle.
        Parameters:
        x - Indicates the first element of the vector to rotate.
        y - Indicates the second element of the vector to rotate.
        z - Indicates the third element of the vector to rotate.
        degrees - Indicates the number of degrees to rotate.
        Since:
        4

      • setRotateAbout

        public void setRotateAbout​(float x,
                           float y,
                           float z,
                           float radians)
        Rotates about the vector [x, y, z] by a specified radian. If the vector [x, y, z] is not a unit vector, it will be automatically resized.
        Parameters:
        x - Indicates the first element of the vector to rotate.
        y - Indicates the second element of the vector to rotate.
        z - Indicates the third element of the vector to rotate.
        radians - Indicates the number of radians to rotate.
        Since:
        4

      • setRotateAboutUnit

        public void setRotateAboutUnit​(float x,
                               float y,
                               float z,
                               float radians)
        Rotates about the vector [x, y, z] as a unit vector by a specified radian. This method does not check the vector length.
        Parameters:
        x - Indicates the first element of the vector to rotate.
        y - Indicates the second element of the vector to rotate.
        z - Indicates the third element of the vector to rotate.
        radians - Indicates the number of radians to rotate.
        Since:
        4
